mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT A.BBS_SEQ , A.WRTR_ID , A.TITLE , A.INQ_CNT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.WRTR_DD, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRTR_DD , TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(A.LST_UPD_DDTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LST_UPD_DDTM , B.USE_YN AS IMG_YN FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTCH B ON (A.BBS_SEQ = B.BBS_SEQ)
WHERE (A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR A.CONTN LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%')
ORDER BY A.BBS_SEQ DESC
SELECT BBS_SEQ , TITLE , CONTN , WRTR_ID , WRTR_DD , WRTR_TM , LST_UPD_USR_ID , LST_UPD_USR_NM , LST_UPD_DDTM , USE_YN FROM BOARD WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}
